ComicInfo.Summary:
There are many assassins in the known universe, this is the story of the most well-mannered one.
“Good manners will open doors that the best assassin cannot.”
*Chapter Titles* Chapter Thirteen [Work Less, Make More] Chapter Fourteen [Pack Your Bags For A One Way Trip] Chapter Fifteen [You Can't Go Home Again] *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Mike Huddleston | 1 | | B | Cover B | Mike Huddleston | 2 |
